features.title: CSV File Import
features.description: Upload and parse CSV files with drag-and-drop support

features.title: Column Mapping UI
features.description: Map CSV columns to inventory fields with AI suggestions

features.title: Multi-step Wizard Component
features.description: Reusable wizard stepper with navigation and validation

features.title: Diagram Image Upload
features.description: Support for PNG/JPG diagram uploads

features.title: AI Object Detection
features.description: Detect objects in architecture diagrams using vision API

features.title: Object Classification
features.description: Classify detected objects into fact sheet types (Application, Server, etc.)

features.title: Relationship Detection (Diagrams)
features.description: Detect and classify arrows/connections in diagrams

features.title: All Fact Sheet Type Support
features.description: Support import for all fact sheet types (not just Applications)

features.title: Data Validation Engine
features.description: Duplicate detection, required fields, data type validation

features.title: Import Error Recovery
features.description: Resume failed imports and handle large files

features.title: Train on Common Diagram Formats
features.description: Train AI models on Archimate, Ardoq, Visio, Drawio, PPT formats for better extraction accuracy
features.customer_pain: New customers with legacy diagrams get poor extraction results

features.title: Format Detection & Quality Score
features.description: Auto-detect input format, show confidence score and quick-fix suggestions before import
features.customer_pain: Users don't understand expected accuracy of imports

features.title: Image-to-Diagram Conversion
features.description: Convert PNG/JPG to editable shapes with dictionary mapping and new fact sheet creation
features.customer_pain: Can't convert PPT slides to linked inventory diagrams easily

features.title: Interactive Confirm-and-Link Wizard
features.description: Step-by-step wizard for conversion, matching, and linking imported items to inventory
features.customer_pain: Inventory builder not intuitive, failed imports due to ambiguous mapping

features.title: Prompt Templates & Best Practices
features.description: In-app prompt gallery with examples and help panel for crafting correct prompts
features.customer_pain: Users confused about how to structure prompts, inconsistent results

features.title: Preview Mode & Dry-Run Sharing
features.description: Preview interpreted elements before import, share read-only dry-run link with support
features.customer_pain: Can't easily share problematic imports with support for triage

features.title: Export/Enrich/Re-Import Workflow
features.description: Export template with stable schema, guided mapping UI, validation, and merge options (create/update/skip)
features.customer_pain: Users export to Excel, enrich with Copilot, then struggle with re-import

features.title: Condensed Default Views for AI Fields
features.description: Default compact attribute set with admin toggles to show/hide additional AI fields
features.customer_pain: Too many AI attributes displayed by default, overwhelming for users

features.title: Join Attributes from Related Fact Sheets
features.description: Add columns from related fact sheets in table view (native join functionality)
features.customer_pain: Must export to Excel to join data from multiple fact sheet types

features.title: Multi-Fact Sheet Export Views
features.description: Native capability to export joined views (CSV/Excel/JSON) without manual Excel work
features.customer_pain: Excel is the only option for multi-table reporting

features.title: Saved Views & Scheduled Exports
features.description: Save table configurations as named views, schedule recurring exports to email/S3/webhook
features.customer_pain: Need to manually recreate table setup and extract data repeatedly

features.title: Staging Area for Import Governance
features.description: Two-stage import: upload to staging inbox where central team reviews and approves before final import to production
features.customer_pain: Large orgs (7k+ users) need data quality control. Without approval workflow, mass uploads create duplicates and erratic AI data

features.title: System User Context for Imports
features.description: Run imports as system user (e.g., 'LeanIX Support') instead of personal account to avoid attribution confusion
features.customer_pain: All imported fact sheets attributed to admin personally, causing confusion about who created what

features.title: Granular Field-Level Update Control
features.description: Specify which fields to update vs. preserve during import, show diff between existing and new values with confirmation
features.customer_pain: Want to update specific attributes (lifecycle) while preserving existing data (descriptions, relations). No granularity

features.title: Data Type & Validation Visibility
features.description: Display field types (string, picklist, number), character limits, validation rules, and conflicts before import
features.customer_pain: Don't know if mappings will fail due to data type mismatches, missing picklist values, or character limits until after import

features.title: Save & Reuse Mapping Templates
features.description: Save mappings as reusable templates, share across org, auto-suggest based on file structure, with search
features.customer_pain: Recurring imports require recreating mappings each time. Need to standardize imports across teams

features.title: Visual Import Action Differentiation
features.description: Color-code import impact: new items (green), updates (blue), unchanged (gray), empty (yellow), errors (red)
features.customer_pain: Can't easily see what will be created vs. updated, hard to verify changes before import

features.title: Recently Imported Items Filter
features.description: After import, auto-filter to show only just-imported items with creation date sorting
features.customer_pain: Can't easily find what was just added to verify results. Must manually filter by creation date

features.title: Automatic Import Source Tagging
features.description: Auto-tag imported items with source (file name, import date, channel) for tracking and filtering
features.customer_pain: Can't identify which items came from which import, especially for bulk operations

features.title: Inline Editing in Review
features.description: Edit detected values directly in review screen with pencil icons, without returning to source files
features.customer_pain: Making corrections requires going back to Excel and re-uploading, slow for small changes

features.title: Relationship Diagram in Review
features.description: Show interactive relationship diagram during review to visualize connections
features.customer_pain: Hard to understand relationships in list format, especially for complex imports

features.title: Soft Delete with Undo
features.description: Gray out removed detection objects instead of deleting, allow restoration if clicked accidentally
features.customer_pain: Accidental deletion loses work, no undo functionality

features.title: Re-prompt AI Analysis
features.description: Provide additional context/prompts to refine AI detection without full re-upload
features.customer_pain: Initial AI detection incomplete or incorrect, need ability to adjust without starting over

features.title: Subtype Selection in Review
features.description: Assign fact sheet subtypes during review using drag-and-drop or dropdown
features.customer_pain: Must manually add subtypes after import in inventory, time-consuming for bulk imports

features.title: Bulk Import All Button
features.description: Add 'Import All' button at top and bottom of review for quick selection of all items
features.customer_pain: For large imports (100-500 items), scrolling to select all is tedious

features.title: Error-Only Filter View
features.description: Filter review screen to show only items with validation errors or missing required fields
features.customer_pain: With 500+ rows, scrolling through all items to find errors is inefficient
